customer_name: Parker Exotic Pets L L C

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:50 AM on
9/10/2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by ringing doorbell, knocking on business door, calling
business phone and cell phone, and leaving a message on both phones. Waited for 30 minutes for the licensee to call or
show up. Called licensee again after waiting 30 minutes and left a message on both phones for the licensee to call me as
soon as possible. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the
AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:50 AM on 
9/10/2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by ringing doorbell, knocking on business door, calling 
business phone and cell phone, and leaving a message on both phones. Waited for 30 minutes for the licensee to call or 
show up. Called licensee again after waiting 30 minutes and left a message on both phones for the licensee to call me as 
soon as possible. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the 
AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
